fields.Title of Presentation: <p><span>Swan, K. Scott and Shikhar Sarin (2024), “</span><span>How has Design Evolved? A Dialogue with Leading Designers,”   June 5-7, </span></p>
fields.Conference/Meeting Name: Innovation and Product Development Management (IPDM) Conference,
fields.Description/Abstract: <p><span>IDEO, the top design consultancy, laid off about 1/3 of its employees between 2020 and 2023 (Fast Company website, 2023). How did this award-winning practitioner fall so fast? Did the value of design change or did the way it was thought about and implemented change?  The</span> objective of this research is to understand “good design” principles and their evolution over the last half century</p>
